text: Michel Chodkiewicz (13 May 1929 – 31 March 2020) was a French author and a scholar of Sufism. He was Director-General then President and CEO of Editions du Seuil from 1977 to 1989. He became director of studies at the École des hautes études en sciences sociales where he conducted seminars on Ibn 'Arabi.
